about_the_game:
Expand your adventure with the Two Worlds II Digital Deluxe Content! This exclusive Pack for Two Worlds II contains:

  • Two Worlds II Artbook (PDF 72 pages*)
  • Two Worlds II Compendium (PDF 112 pages*)
  • Two Worlds II World Map (PDF)
  • Two Worlds II Pirates of the Flying Fortress Map (PDF)
  • Two Worlds II Dusty Scroll Labyrinth Map (PDF)
  • Two Worlds II Cover Art Poster (PDF)
  • Two Worlds II Pirates of the Flying Fortress Poster (PDF)
  • Two Worlds II Dragon Queen Poster (PDF)
  • Two Worlds II Novels (4 exciting stories taking place in Antaloor, PDF)
  • Two Worlds II Avatar Pack (15 Avatars, PNG 256x256 - 32x32)
  • Two Worlds II Bonus Items (Anatros Sword, Elexorian Sword, Maliel´s Downfall Speer, Dragon Scale Armor, Dusty Scroll Labyrinth Map)
  • Two Worlds II Pirates of the Flying Fortress Bonus Items (Solefist Hammer, Platinum Pirate Badge, Arbalest of Demolition Crosbow)

* amount of pages in PDF may vary, because of pages displayed as double pages

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS *: Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista, Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Single-Core Prozessor (2,0 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 2 GB or more
  • Graphics: Radeon HD, Geforce 8800GT (Shader 3.0 and 512 MB RAM)
  • DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c or OpenGL
  • Hard Drive: 8 GB
  • Sound: DirectX comp. Stereo Sound Card
  • Other: Internet connection with 6.000 BPS or more for Multiplayer recommended

short_description: This Digital Deluxe Content for Two Worlds II contains: Artbook, Compendium, World Map, PotFF Map, Dusty Scroll Labyrinth Map, Cover Art Poster, PotFF Poster, Dragon Queen Poster, 4 Novels, Avatar Packo, five TW2 Bonus Items and three PotFF Bonus Items
